news.title: Google to acquire cloud security startup Wiz for $32 billion
news.summary: Google signed a "definitive agreement" to acquire Wiz for $32 billion in an all-cash deal. The deal is expected to close in the next few weeks.

news.title: Frontier Airlines offers free checked bags promotion in swipe at Southwest
news.summary: Frontier Airlines is offering free checked luggage and economy bundles. The bundles come with seat assignments and carry-on bags. The airline is based in Denver, Colorado.

news.title: Slower economic growth is likely ahead with risk of a recession rising, according to the CNBC Fed Survey
news.summary: Survey respondents raised the probability of recession to 36% from 23% in January. The 32 survey respondents include fund managers, strategists and analysts.

news.title: Tesla's China rival Zeekr to roll out advanced driver assistance-system for free
news.summary: Chinese electric car company Zeekr is releasing advanced driver-assistance capabilities to its local customers for free as competition heats up. The company is releasing the technology to its customers in China for free.

news.title: DOJ seeks to boot judge questioning Trump deportations, lawyer warns of 'constitutional crisis'
news.summary: The Trump administration has used the wartime Alien Enemies Act to deport hundreds of alleged Venezuelan gang members to Central America. The deportations have taken place under the guise of fighting the "Venezuelan drug trade"

news.title: The cost of U.S. imports jump in February. Is it the Trump tariff effect?
news.summary: The cost of imports rose faster than usual in February, perhaps a result of U.S. companies rushing to bring in foreign goods ahead of President Donald Trump's tariffs.

news.title: Wall Street’s No. 2 bull holds his ground. The logic? Trump’s popularity could get worse.
news.summary: Deutsche Bank has the second-highest S&P 500 price target on Wall Street. Deutsche Bank is now alone with the second highest price target in the S&P 500.

news.title: Elon Musk discovers ‘magic money computers,’ or how the U.S. financial system actually works
news.summary: Elon Musk is the chief executive of Tesla and SpaceX and the brainchild of the Department of Government Efficiency. He appeared on Sen. Ted Cruz's podcast to discuss what he’s learned in Washington.

news.title: Tesla’s stock gets its lowest price target from a bull. It still implies 39% upside.
news.summary: RBC Capital Markets cut Tesla’s expected price mark to $320 from $440 on lower projections for robotaxi and self-driving software.

news.title: Trump’s reciprocal tariffs could bring stagflation — and deflate his support
news.summary: If tariffs spike inflation and slow U.S. growth, his popularity could suffer. Trump campaigned on bringing prices down. He wants to bring down the cost of living.
